title: Integrated Murphy Beds
intro: Transform a home office or den into a comfortable guest room instantly. Modern wall beds that blend seamlessly with custom cabinetry.
highlights: Seamless look that hides the bed completely when closed
Integrated desks and library shelving options
Spring-balanced mechanisms for effortless one-handed operation
Designed for standard mattresses (no thin foam pads required)

avgCost.notes: Price depends on mattress size (Queen/Full), cabinetry finish, and side-pier additions (desks/shelves).

faqs.q: Can I use my own mattress?
faqs.a: Yes, these wall beds accommodate standard coil or foam mattresses up to 11-12 inches thick.

faqs.q: Do I need to bolt it to the floor?
faqs.a: No, systems attach securely to the wall studs, preserving your flooring.
